description: When a patient enters new data in the Immunizations section of Your Health Record in the web-based chart system, a new record is created in this table. NOTE: this is patient-entered data and is not part of the patient's official medical record.

columns.name: INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the "Your Health Record" immunization record.

columns.name: MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the web-based chart system account that is associated with the "Your Health Record" immunization record.

columns.name: IMMUNIZATION_NAME
columns.description: The name of the immunization, as entered by the web-based chart system patient.

columns.name: IMM_LAST_ADMIN
columns.description: The date the immunization was last administered, as entered by the web-based chart system patient.

columns.name: IMM_COMMENTS
columns.description: Any text entered into the Immunization Comments field by the web-based chart system patient.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The date and time that this record was pulled into enterprise reporting

columns.name: IMM_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The immunization status category number for the "Your Health Record" immunization record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Deleted
